org.usfirst.frc.team1699.utils.inireader

Class ConfigSection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team1699.utils.inireader.ConfigSection

  • public class ConfigSection
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a section of a configuration file. It stores multiple ConfigLine objects and has methods to access and process them.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConfigSection(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a ConfigSection with the name provided

      • getLine

        public ConfigLine<?> getLine(int index)
        Gets the ConfigLine at a specified point. Useful for autonomous. Returns null if the index is out of bounds.
        Parameters:
        index - index in the ArrayList to return
        Returns:
        the ConfigFile at the specified index, null if it does not exist

      • getLine

        public ConfigLine<?> getLine(java.lang.String name)
        Get a ConfigLine based on the provided name. Returns the first ConfigLine with that name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the ConfigLine to look for
        Returns:
        the ConfigLine that matches the specified name, null if it does not exist

      • getLines

        public java.util.List<ConfigLine<?>> getLines()
        Get the contents of this ConfigSection. Useful for autonomous.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of ConfigLines that make up this ConfigSection

      • getLineValue

        public <L> L getLineValue(java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.Class<L> class_type)
        Gets the value of a ConfigLine without using a dot operator! Cool!
        Type Parameters:
        L - the type to check against
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the ConfigLine to look for
        class_type - the Class of the type
        Returns:
        the the value of this ConfigLine or null if the types do not match

      • getStringValues

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getStringValues()
        Get the contents of this ConfigSection as a List of Strings.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Strings made from the ConfigLines in the ConfigSection
